hooks.command: case "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json) timeout 10s bunx biome check --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>/dev/null || true ;; esac

bash -c 'CMD=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r .command 2>/dev/null); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qP "\bbun\s+test\b" && ! echo "$CMD" | grep -qP "\bbun\s+run\s+test\b"; then echo "BLOCKED: Use '\''bun run test'\'' (vitest) instead of '\''bun test'\'' (Bun'\''s built-in runner). Bare '\''bun test'\'' causes infinite CPU spin."; exit 1; fi'
